data.title: the commercial heartbeat of St. John's, Manchester
data.meta_description: Enterprise is the commercial heartbeat of St. John's. It's places to work, stay, eat, drink, places to shop; it's everything, it's 'a city'.
data.text:
ENTERPRISE AT ST. JOHN’S

A NEW HUB FOR THE TECH, MEDIA & CREATIVE INDUSTRIES

Enterprise is the commercial heartbeat of St. John’s. It’s places to work, places to stay, places to eat, places to drink, places to shop; it’s everything, it’s ‘a city’. Enterprise is an integral part of the St. John’s city. It’s reaching out to the world, it’s positioning Manchester’s innovation, tech and creative industries. It’s called Enterprise City.

St. John’s provides a series of tech-driven and creative buildings where modern industry can flourish by focusing on digital skills, exemplary talent, new technologies and global communication. It’s already home to a range of organisations from world leading technology to highly creative start-ups and media production studios.

ENTERPRISE CITY

THE FUTURE OF MODERN INDUSTRY

CONNECT | COLLABORATE | CREATE

Enterprise City is an inspirational new district of the city located within St. John’s. with exceptional workspaces, inspiring cultural spaces, and bespoke city centre living. It’s a media, tech and creative cluster designed to connect people and businesses, encourage collaboration, and create success through expert place-making.

Enterprise City will be one of the most concentrated city centre hubs for digital, creative and media businesses in Europe – supporting local business, bringing in global business

At the heart of Enterprise City are some of the best international brands such as Booking.com (Manchester Goods Yard), WPP (Globe & Simpson), Soho House (Old Granada Studios) and The Farm (ABC).
